issues.description: The problem statement and UML define orderMeal(Meal) as returning void, but the solution implementation declares public boolean orderMeal(Meal). This return type mismatch could confuse students about what signature to implement and lead to failing expected tests.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the return type of orderMeal in the solution (and template) to void (remove the boolean return), so it matches the problem specification and UML.
